name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BitSnap Wallet: Your Secure Gateway to UTXO Assets

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securely store, send, and receive digital assets directly from your Chrome browser using the UTXO model.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BitSnap Wallet puts UTXO management at your fingertips.

KEY FEATURES:

- Multiple account creation options (Private Key, Mnemonics).
- Multichain features and multi-account management.
- Effortlessly store, transfer, and receive UTXO-based assets such as Inscriptions, BRC-20, and Runes.
- UTXO Model support for Bitcoin, TBC, and more.
- Mainnet and Testnet support.
- Seamless DApp integration for all address types.
- Global accessibility with multiple language support.

SECURITY IS OUR PRIORITY

- Your keys, your crypto: Generate and store private keys and mnemonic phrases locally.
- Full asset control and complete privacy protection.

BitSnap: Built for Beginners and Experts Alike

Whether youâ€™re a veteran of UTXO-based models or new to crypto, BitSnap provides the tools you need for secure and seamless transactions within your Chrome browser

Be part of the BitSnap journey! Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/bitsnap_fi
